channel.title: [317][Delta] Getting Started! [Noob Friendly]
channel.description:
Hi, This is my first tutorial in here. So without long reading lets get started. [b]Sections[/b] 1.0 - Running Server - Compling Server 1.1 Making yourself Admin
[b]Running the Server![/b] First all you need is JDK ( newest ) If you want to rename your runserver GO Right Click " Runserver.bat " Edit For example theres [code]title WMScape Run[/code] Change it to " your server run " Then hit X When you want run your server hit twice runserver.bat " YOURSERVER IS NOW ONLINE! "
[b]Compling the server![/b] For start! As i just told you can rename complier too ( same method ) Now, if it says Cannot find path etc. Right click -> edit -> theres something like this [code] "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java [/code] Now if you dont have newest update just edit the 20 to your version ( atm 21 is best ) Then save and hit X Now you can compile!
[b]Making yourself admin![/b] First of Open Source again, -> click map " Characters " (IF YOU HAVEN'T LOGGED IN AND OUT THERE WONT BE UR ACC .LOG) Find your account .log and double click it. There you'll see [code] Rights = 0 [/code] Edit "0" to 3 - 2 or 1 ( 3 is owner ) ( 2 admin ) ( 1 mod )

item.title: [317][Delta] Getting Started! [Noob Friendly]
item.dc:creator: @ajaypalsingh ajaypalsingh
item.description:
@ajaypalsingh wrote:

Hi, This is my first tutorial in here. So without long reading lets get started.
Sections
1.0

  • Running Server
  • Compling Server
    1.1
    Making yourself Admin

Running the Server!
First all you need is JDK ( newest )
If you want to rename your runserver
GO
Right Click " Runserver.bat "
Edit
For example theres

title WMScape Run

Change it to " your server run "
Then hit X
When you want run your server hit twice runserver.bat
" YOURSERVER IS NOW ONLINE! "

Compling the server!
For start!
As i just told you can rename complier too ( same method )
Now, if it says Cannot find path etc.
Right click -> edit -> theres something like this

 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java

Now if you dont have newest update just edit the 20 to your version ( atm 21 is best )
Then save and hit X
Now you can compile!

Making yourself admin!
First of Open Source again, -> click map " Characters "
(IF YOU HAVEN’T LOGGED IN AND OUT THERE WONT BE UR ACC .LOG)
Find your account .log and double click it.
There you’ll see Rights = 0
Edit “0” to 3 - 2 or 1 ( 3 is owner ) ( 2 admin ) ( 1 mod )

Read full topic
